content: अनादर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] Showing no respect, indifferent, calm, regardless; <ls>M. 3. 15.</ls> --रः [न. त.] {@--1@} Disregard, disrespect, disdain, contempt; षष्ठी चानादरे <ls>P. II. 3. 38</ls>, मन्यकर्मणि अनादरे विभाषाऽ प्राणिषु <ls n="P. II. 3..">17.</ls> {@--2@} Ease, facility (one of the senses of आदर being ‘effort or care’, see the word); °खंडितशंकरशरासनः <ls>U. 1</ls> (perhaps also ‘without any respect for the bow of the great god’); अनादरोपात्तधृतैकसायकं <ls>Ki. 14. 36.</ls>
